publications.name: DRIN: Dynamic Relation Interactive Network for Multimodal Entity Linking
publications.summary: Explicitly model four types of alignment between multimodal mentions and entities and uses a dynamic Graph Convolutional Network to automatically select appropriate alignment relations for different input samples.

publications.name: EFUF: Efficient Fine-grained Unlearning Framework for Mitigating Hallucinations in Multimodal Large Language Models
publications.summary: Leverage external expert knowledge to reinforce the alignment between language and vision, thereby reducing multimodal hallucinations with no manually annotated data and minial computational resources.

publications.name: AlignGPT: Multi-modal Large Language Models with Adaptive Alignment Capability.
publications.summary: Create distinct alignment vectors for differently aligned text-image pairs during pretraining, and allocate them to various subtasks in finetuning and inference.

publications.name: Learning from Different text-image Pairs: A Relation-enhanced Graph Convolutional Network for Multimodal NER.
publications.summary: Utilize Graph Neural Networks to capture external matching relationships across different text-image pairs.

publications.name: AnyPrefer: An Automatic Framework for Preference Data Synthesis
publications.summary: Design a framework that can automatically generate preference data for multiple scenarios without requiring manual annotation.
